N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7328.1 - Policy

State Regulations
(a) Within a
facility, exercise, recreation and leisure activities are essential to youth
health and contribute to reducing youth tension. Pursuant to the requirements
of this Part, the director shall require that the facility provide exercise, recreation and leisure activities for all youth. (b) Consistent with the requirements of this

Part, the director shall develop written policies and procedures regarding
youth access to exercise, recreation and leisure activities. The written
policies and procedures shall be reviewed annually and updated as
needed. Notes
